cast.overview: In 1962 Hong Kong, neighbors Su Li-zhen (Mrs. Chan) and Chow Mo-wan (Mr. Chow) discover their spouses are having an affair. As they spend time together, they develop feelings for each other, but their relationship remains chaste and unspoken, reflecting societal constraints and their own moral compass.
cast.title: In the Mood for Love

details.biography: Roy Cheung Yiu-Yeung (Chinese: 張耀揚, pinyin: Zhāng Yàoyáng; born 20 July 1964 in Hong Kong) is a Hong Kong-based actor, best known on-screen for his roles as villains or gangsters in a number of films.
details.name: Roy Cheung Yiu-Yeung
details.place_of_birth: Hong Kong, British Crown Colony [now China]
